text: Thea Ruth White (n√©e Zitzner; June 16, 1940 - July 30, 2021)http://www.intelius.com/results.php?ReportType=1&qf;=Thea&qmi;=R&qn;=White&qcs;=NJ&focusfirst;=0 was an American voice actress. She was best known for her voice over work as Muriel Bagge on Courage the Cowardly Dog. She was born in Newark, New Jersey. White was married to Andy White from 1983 until his death in 2015. White died on July 30, 2021 in Cleveland, Ohio from an infection caused by liver cancer surgery, aged 81.Courage the Cowardly Dog Star Thea White Dies at 81 ==References== ==Other websites== *Thea White's official website * Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Newark, New Jersey Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Infectious disease deaths in New Jersey Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey
title: Thea White
